thread.title: Itchen Bridge in Southampton closed due to police incident
thread.title_full: Itchen Bridge in Southampton closed due to police incident

title: Itchen Bridge in Southampton closed due to police incident
text:
3 comments 
A SOUTHAMPTON bridge was closed to traffic in both directions after a “police incident”. 
The Itchen Bridge was closed at about 10.50am and motorists were advised to avoid the area and use alternative routes. 
Traffic congestion was reported and First Southampton diverted a number of its bus services due to the incident. 
According to police, the incident "involved vehicles and pedestrians". 
Officers at the scene have said they were called to 'concern for welfare' and one man was taken from the bridge in an ambulance. Share article 
The bridge was fully reopened by 11.10am. 
Anyone with information is asked to contact Hampshire Constabulary on 101. Promoted Stories Itchen Bridge in Southampton closed due to police incident   Brite Spark 12:08pm Tue 22 Sep 15 
Why do the police talk in riddles instead of given the public a better understanding as to what is going on? Why do the police talk in riddles instead of given the public a better understanding as to what is going on? Brite Spark
